Edward W. Helfrick (March 11, 1928 â€“ September 28, 2021) was a Republican member of the Pennsylvania State Senate. He also served in the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from 1977 to 1980.
Helfrick died on September 28, 2021, at the age of 93.
